author: jm
msg: bug 5577: spamc on win32 reports corrupt error messages if spamd host is unresolveable or unconnectable.  fix

author: jm
msg: bug 5556: fix a variety of sa-compile portability issues, and support for 5.6.x perls

author: jm
msg: bug 5514: make 'score set for a non-existent rule' a debug message, instead of a lint warning, since it's a very frequent FAQ

author: jm
msg: bug 5493: sa-compile fails to correctly deal with escaped backslashes.  fix

author: jm
msg: bug 5665: spamd may fail to notice that a child has completed exiting, and keeps in the child list in state 'K', eventually filling up the child list with 'ghost' children.  fix
